column1: I have tried a variety of creams, and I found RoC to be the best. I like the way it makes my skin feel, and most people can never guess my age. Vanity aside, it really does work. I use all the RoC products for night and day.

I have been using this night cream for the past two weeks. I see more radiant skin. Also have gotten compliments. I am a 67 year old woman. I use to be a sun worshiper when I was younger and this really is helping with some of the wrinkles. I use the night cream with the day cream with noticeable improvements. I really do recommend. I will be trying the other Roc products soon.

This is an amazing product. It makes my skin so soft and I've never broken out from it. My wrinkles have virtually vanished and my makeup goes on smoother and smoother every day. Not greasy. Would highly recommend.

I have sun spots that *nothing* has ever been able to shift. I've even had microdermabrasion without good results. Within 3 weeks of starting this product, my stubborn spots are fading away. As for the fine lines, I have to get very close to the mirror now to see them. Even the one on my cheek from sleeping on my side is becoming much less noticeable. I've already added in other Roc products to my regime and will continue to do so as I use up the much more expensive products I've been using.

I tried the 5 in 1 Restoring Night Cream after a friend recommended it. I have sensitive skin and was happy there was no Retinol in this product as it is irritating. I was very impressed after one night of using this cream. My pores seemed noticeably smaller and my skin looked brighter. I have been using it now for a week and every morning my skin gets better and better. This just replaced by old night cream.

I just started using this product 2 nights ago. I had immediate results. I have roscea and hyper pigmentation. The very first morning after using this product the redness in my face and chest area was seriously decreased. I'm 45 yrs old and have been in the beauty industry myself for 27 yrs. I have tried countless products over the years. I am just completely amazed by this product and I cannot wait to see what my skin looks like after the jar is gone!

I've been using this nightly with & without a nighttime moisturizer and my skin feels very soft. So far, I haven't noticed any major changes but I haven't been using it that long. Only time will tell.

I used this night cream for the first time and woke up with my face extremely itchy, dry, puffy and red. The itching was so terrible it woke me up in the middle of the night. My skin isn't overly sensitive, but I guess if you have even slightly sensitive skin STAY AWAY.

I was very excited to try this product since i have some sun damage and was looking for a good night cream to help with that. It left my cheeks, forehead and nose very soft and glowing, however i have bumps on my chin that are drying out and peeling skin between my nose and lips. I don't normally have sensitive skin. Not happy for what i paid for the product and disappointed that it does not work for me but maybe it works for others.

I have been using this product for nearly a year if not longer. I was very happy with the results, I have problems with skin sensitivity and with fragrances as well. Then the jar I bought about a month ago was different. It feels kind of whipped up, and leaves a film on my skin. I am not able to use it anymore. I am very disappointed. I wish you would indicate when changes are made to products. Then I would know I am taking a chance on buying something I cannot use - this product is not inexpensive.

I have oily skin, but still wanted a good night cream to reverse signs of aging. I've never been able to use night creams because they all make me oilier and break out. This cream is amazing! It absorbs right in and does not make me oily. My face just feels soft after using it! Highly recommend.

I bought this product thinking it was going to make my skin feel hydrated and help prevent fine lines. The first couple of days were fine then by the 3rd day I woke up and have these red bombs all over my face especially my cheeks. As the day went on they got worse and turned into white pimples and itched! My skin was clear before with no pimples and smooth now I have to deal with this!!! Very upset on what this cream did to my face!

I'm one week in and I can definitely tell a difference with results of smoother rejuvenated skin in the morning! I have dry skin spots at my temples from a thyroid condition. I have been seeking a product that will smooth those areas and resurface the skin. So far I notice a positive difference of smoother skin.

Since I've started using this (about two weeks ago), several people have commented that I do not look my age! I haven't heard that in quite a long time. My skin feels firmer and looks healthier. It smells good and goes a long way. I love it. Thank you!

I used this product last night and woke up with tiny red bumps all over my face. I have been using ROC products for 10 years so this was a surprise. Face looks like it has prickly heat bumps all over especially on my cheeks and forehead. Dont know what to do to help it. Disappointed because I was saving money to justifiy buying it.

This product makes my face feel nice. I have been using it for 2 weeks and see an improvement in the texture. It's no miracle cream, like all other face creams,. I do see a difference and like that I don't have to put on so many different face and neck stuff because this covers 5 problems. Warning, it does have a scent. It is a little strong until you become used to it, but I personally like the scent. I also use the day cream.

I have been using this product for three weeks. The label indicates 4 weeks to see improvement. I began seeing results within one week. The blotchiness and dark spots are gone, my skin tone has evened out, and feels/looks tighter and firmer. My makeup blends better, and when I choose not to wear foundation, I can do it now with confidence. I have tried more expensive/more popular brands; however, those brans cannot compare to the mult correxion Restoring night crème.

This is one moisturizer that actually goes deep into your skin, not sit on top in a grease pile! I'll be 65 here in a few days and people tell me all the time I look ten years younger. Can't help but think my night cream is the reason! I'll never be without it unless they stop making it!

I have very sensitive skin that is highly prone to breakouts and this product has not broke me out one time. I love it I have used so many moisturizers trying to find a good one that didn't break me out and I have found it, I see me using this stuff for a long time. Please never get rid of this product!! I feel like it actually reduces redness and scaring that I have from previous breakouts as well. A+ product all around for me :) I'm 27 now so I don't really have a problem with wrinkles but I'm sure it will help in preventing them.

The RoC Multi Correxion night serum - no spf (I can't use spf on my face) literally made my skin glow and look easily 8 years younger. It was my go to. I have searched everywhere for it. All of the other roc products are greasy and not even close to being as effective as the RoC Multi Correxion night serum. It is super disappointing. Now I have to pay almost triple the price at a very expensive brand name. Your company is horrible for booting this product.

First time using any product and I am so Impressed with this Product. Used it only a couple of times so far and already see the results. I have fine line and a little saggy skin under my chin and After using this product I look as if I am 6 yrs younger, back to when I didn't have saggy skin or fine lines. I am going to buy this product for my close friends who also are seeing the fine lines. This would make a perfect gift for anyone. Thank you so much for making me feel better about my skin and face again!

I feel the fragrance is a little strong and I get a slight tingling when the product is applied, but I love the way my skin looks in the morning. I have pretty sensitive skin and have had reactions with produts in the past. This is not one of them, Very pleasantly suprised.

I have been a loyal ROC customer for probably a decade. I will continue to use the 5 in 1 night cream, however, please bring back the Multi-Correction Night Cream that was in a tube. I would have given a “5” rating, but for me, the other works much better. Thank you!

As stated I am in fact a Grammie, age 65 yrs. I have been using this product nightly for three - four weeks with exceptional results. My skin looks and feels supple. I have received many compliments that I look much younger than my age and how my complexion looks so healthy. Thank you to Johnson and Johnson.

I have just started to use this product; about two weeks. I have very sensitive skin and was so afraid the 5-1 night cream would break me out. To my surprise I have not had any breakouts and I think I'm starting to see a change in my skin. I am giving it a little more time. But, so far so good! I do not think the smell is bad at all!! I can tolerate the smell as long as the product is working for me.

I've been looking in the mirror for the past week trying to figure out why my face looks different. It finally hit me that those deep, deep "parentheses" lines from my nose down around my mouth are almost gone! I look 10 years younger. I've only been using this product for about a month. I am very pleased with the results. My skin is more even and the dark spots are lighter. I am 46 years old and I highly recommend this product.

I have used the 5 in one night cream for two nights and on the third day my face swelled and was burned. It feels so dry I hate to move it. As I am writing this I can feel little bumps forming, almost like blisters. Have used Roc products before with no problems, I have seen that others have had similar reactions to this particular product. My skin is not sensitive. Hope to get my purchase refunded.

My new best friend! This is a light feeling product, so you don't feel like you are weighed down under 15 pounds of grease. It's great! Your face feels moisturized and smooth and clean! It also absorbs quickly. My skin is very dry, but this product makes it feel very good even when I wake up the next morning. I have noticed a more vibrant appearance in the morning, which is a very nice change from the dull look I had grown accustomed to. And it lasts a long time!

After 3 days I've seen a reduction in pore size and redness. My skin looks rested. My only complaint is the horrible old lady scent...gag! I just wish all beauty products had no scent, or all natural scents from essential oils, as perfumes give me a headache.

I tried this product for two nights. The first night it was fine. By the second night, I woke up the following morning with very puffy eyes ( I made sure the product was not near my eyes when I applied) and the skin below my eyes was bright red. My eyes are very sensitive to any perfumes etc so I am thinking that the scent in the product caused my eye puffiness. Bottom line, if you have sensitivity to anything I would NOT use this product. I am into the second day not using the product and my eyes are still puffy.

I have struggled to find a product that gives my skin a soft feel, I had puffiness under my left eye for quite some time within 3 days it has reduce to almost no puffiness which I am really happy to see so I think this works for me. No break outs or irritation either. Planning on trying some new stuff soon.

I used this product for a few nights and it burned my face. I look like I have sunburn. My skin feels extremely tight, dry and itchy. I have now been searching for a cream to restore my skin. I just picked up an avocado cream that seems to be providing a little relief. I am extremely disappointed in this product. I was looking for a cream to help reduce wrinkles. I never expected my skin would look worse after using this product!!

I enjoyed getting to try a sample of RoC Multi Correction 5-in-1 Restoring Night Cream for free. It was pleasant to use, and had a nice scent. I live in Puerto-Rico, where the sun can d some damage to my skin. I started noticing my skin sagging and age spots where noticeably visible. I started searching for products and I brought this one.
